content: simple chevron stripe scarf by karin martinez finished measurements after blocking approx 6 feet long & 6 inches wide materials required size 4 us 3 5mm knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge of approx 32 row & 36 stitches per 4 inches o approx 385-440 yards of fingering weight or sock yarn self-striping if you want stripes tapestry needle for weaving in yarn ends blocking pins and/or blocking wires page 1 of 2 key co cast on k knit p purl kfb knit into the front and the back of the same stitch creating 2 new stitches from one cdd centered double decrease slip 2 stitches together knitwise knit the next stitch pass the slipped stitches over the newly knit stitch instructions between brackets are worked as a group for the number of times specified pattern cast on 52 stitches long-tail cast on is recommended row 1-4 knit all row 5 k3 kfb k5 cdd k5 kfb * 3 k4 row 6 k3 p46 k3 repeat row 5 & 6 ending after a row 5 until desired length or you have just enough yarn left for approx 6 more row repeat row 1-4 bind off knitwise block to desired size approx 72 long x 6 wide & enjoy page 2 of 2
